metadata.title: CVE-2021-22262 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Missing access control in all GitLab versions starting from 13.12 before14.0.9, all versions starting from 14.1 before 14.1.4, and all versionsstarting from 14.2 before 14.2.2 with Jira Cloud integration enabled allowsJira users without administrative privileges to add and remove Jira ConnectNamespaces via the GitLab.com for Jira Cloud application configuration page

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
